manifest.name: broadcast-channel
manifest.description: A BroadcastChannel that works in New Browsers, Old Browsers, WebWorkers and NodeJs

scripts.test: echo "RUN ALL:" && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:node:loop: npm run test:node && npm run test:node:loop
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently "npm run docs:serve" "sleep 20 && testcafe -b && testcafe chrome -e test/e2e.test.js --hostname localhost" --kill-others --success first
scripts.size:prewebpack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=build webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.size:webpack: npm run size:prewebpack && echo "Build-Size Webpack (minified+gzip):" && gzip-size --raw ./test_tmp/webpack.bundle.js
scripts.size:browserify: npm run build && rimraf test_tmp/browserify.js && browserify --no-builtins dist/lib/browserify.index.js > test_tmp/browserify.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output test_tmp/browserify.min.js -- test_tmp/browserify.js && echo "Build-Size browserify (minified+gzip):" && gzip-size --raw test_tmp/browserify.min.js
scripts.size:rollup: npm run build && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.js && echo "Build-Size Rollup (minified+gzip):" && gzip-size --raw ./test_tmp/rollup.bundle.js
scripts.build:es6: rimraf -rf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir dist/es
scripts.build: npm run clear && concurrently "npm run build:es6" "npm run build:es5" "npm run build:test" && concurrently "npm run build:index" "npm run build:browser" "npm run build:worker" "npm run build:iframe" "npm run build:leader-iframe" && npm run build:lib-browser && npm run build:lib-browser:min
scripts.docs:serve: npm run build && echo "Open http://localhost:8080/" && npm run docs:only

manifest.readme:
BroadcastChannel

A BroadcastChannel that works in old browsers, new browsers, WebWorkers and NodeJs
+ LeaderElection over the channels

![demo.gif](docs/files/demo.gif) * * * A BroadcastChannel that allows you to send data between different browser-tabs or nodejs-processes. And a LeaderElection over the channels. # [Read the full documentation on github](https://github.com/pubkey/broadcast-channel)
